summary: Since 2006, federal laws have required the Department of Health and Human Services to develop a real-time electronic network that would improve the nation's situational awareness during a public health emergency. This network was meant to be used to facilitate early detection of and rapid response to potentially catastrophic infectious disease outbreaks—such as COVID-19 . However, this network is still not operational 15 years later...
title: COVID-19: Pandemic Lessons Highlight Need for Public Health Situational Awareness Network
